name: Savanna
content:
DEFINE PATTERN NAME="girafe" WIDTH=20 HEIGHT=20 DATA=""

DEFINE PATTERN NAME="background" WIDTH=10 HEIGHT=10 DATA="0010001001000101000010001000000101000000001000000001000000011000000011000001111000001000001000000000"

VAR center_x
VAR center_y
VAR secondplusone
VAR rotation
VAR rotationdeux
VAR size
var squareside

LET size = 2 + $COUNTER % 5
LET secondplusone = 1 + $SECOND
LET rotation = 350 * 59 / $secondplusone
LET rotationdeux = 30 + 350 * 59 / $secondplusone 
LET squareside = 20

LET center_x = $width/2 + $size * $squareside /2
LET center_y = $height/2 +  $size * $squareside /2

FILL NAME="background"
FILL_RECT WIDTH=$width HEIGHT=$height X=0 Y=0

TRANSLATE DX=$center_x DY=$center_y

SCALE FACTOR=$size

ROTATE DEGREES=$rotation

COLOR NAME=WHITE
DRAW NAME="girafe" WIDTH=20 HEIGHT=20 X=0 Y=0

ROTATE DEGREES=$rotationdeux

COLOR NAME=BLACK
DRAW NAME="girafe" WIDTH=20 HEIGHT=20 X=0 Y=0
